
# Reticulate  
Reticluate is an R package to integrate Python code and scripts with R, here we will use
it to make circular phylogenetic trees using the Graphlan package.  

# in terminal
```{bash}
cd
pwd
```  
```{bash, eval = F}
# If Mac, update pip and install with python 2.7 like below
pip2.7 install Mercurial
```
```{bash, eval = F}
# Install graphlan with conda
hg clone https://hg@bitbucket.org/nsegata/graphlan
```
